divs: sighting detailsi am only bored out of my mind and prefer not to report these matters. i have sleeping problems and wake up 4 times a night to smoke outside. i see the mufon research program and\or the u.s. government, as i, is all over these events, the only differnce being my witnesses from the ground and fill the blanks in the rest. my trust and faith and love for medical science, philosophy, religion, history and the truth allows me trust for now to share. no explanation is needed the pyramid light formations and the north star-like southern hemisphere nightly appearance i predict is our blessed mother (our lady of fatima) herself, marian. i suppose to get too close to the lights you perhaps lost. you lost youre eyesight, not a desire of a skilled pilot i presume. why is this happening, something personal but i tell you this one thing about these nightly saint charles hauntings.....it all leads to robbery and murder if they let theyre gaurds down in trickery. think about it, should not our riches be focused on medical research and pesticides instead of military like god power and space travel. 10 billion in jet fuel a day? that figure\deed is indeed incorrect on mufon and the governments part. i know god and the ships as good as the best. can they walk in a hungry mad lions cage to feed it. fill in the blanks patient endurance will be our salvations except god knows a mans will to survice must be accomplished through his own will to seek the knowledge of eternity with only jelousy or low self esteem and hopelessness standing in his way. i know our blessed mother is here in saint charles, if we look to the southern hemisphere you will see the brightest ufo in the nights skiess, isis of egypt, marian of israel. rejoice our sacred heart has arrived. pray master will throw us doggies a bone and fly youre white flags in surrender. could our lords or a common man put a million dollars cash in a poor criminals face without being assaulted and robbed? not likely family protects itself , well good families do. so the ufos are spending time in illinois, i know theyre remaining intend suicide and human reincarnation. stay out of theyre way, they are going to commit suicide to transcend into humanity. we are the brightest spot in the depths of the stars and nothing else anywhere is a better option. the extra terrestrials are not our enemies and our lords work will prevail soon. let us not in conclusion limit the possibilities even to the beliefs in time travel for i have seen strange things. cameras flashes our souls like loading a saved spot on youre video game because youre character died, no worries. watch criss angels show, dont let life let you down and dont let them make you suffer, have a beer and baseball. go cubs. our lady of fatima has arrived and lives well on a ufo in saint charles. rejoice, rejoice, rejoice. love family.
